title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama gives synchronous and async APIs for chat, generate, embed, pull.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Lightweight CLI copilot that uses Ollama models for inline code suggestions and shell commands.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example: loads PDFs, creates embeddings with Ollama, and answers questions over your documents.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams answers from local Ollama models into any channel.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to prompt Ollama models inside the editor and insert generated text.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven package with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that exposes a chat completions endpoint proxying to local Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and model auto-pull.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embeddings support; NuGet package.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot server that answers threads using local Ollama models; written in Go.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async wrappers over the Ollama HTTP API with Tokio.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for note summarization and Q&A.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that chats with any Ollama model; supports group topics and inline queries.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantization recipes for Ollama.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot that combines Ollama with ChromaDB for private RAG on local documents.
